channel.title: Help with my server
channel.description:
Okay, I hope this is the right place to post this (I'm not very good with forums -.-) I just was wondering if there was anyone who would be willing to create a server with me (Hamachi server) Ya' know, kind of like a team to help code and such? So yeah, if anyone would like to help me out, I'd really appreciate it =).
-Foxeh.
P.S I really hope this was the right board to post on! ><

item.title: Help with my server
item.dc:creator: @guthix729 guthix729
item.description:
@guthix729 wrote:

I’m not here to discuss the pro’s and con’s of Hamachi, I’m here to get a few people to help me out.

-Foxeh.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my server
item.dc:creator: @Elvemage_0o Elvemage 0o
item.description:
@Elvemage_0o wrote:

well, hamachi = more lag

more chance of getting a virus due to the settings

item.title: Help with my server
item.dc:creator: @guthix729 guthix729
item.description:
@guthix729 wrote:

It seems to be more reliable then an No-Ip service host. I really don’t want to use an No-Ip, because it doesn’t have a built in chat that I can keep track of my members with; which is the main reason I use Ham. Thank you for your suggestion!

-Foxeh

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my server
item.dc:creator: @Elvemage_0o Elvemage 0o
item.description:
@Elvemage_0o wrote:

himachi blows

follow stormcutters “how to make a server guide”

its simple and to the point

–
